alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 9:03PM CST until January 24 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle, light freezing rain and freezing fog expected. Total ice accumulations from a glaze to a couple hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...In Kansas, Jewell, Mitchell, and Osborne Counties. In Nebraska, Nuckolls and Thayer Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
